DOC.brief_summary: Study of endoscopic imaging in the detection of dysplasia within serrated colonic lesions >= 8mm in size
DOC.brief_title: Prediction of Dysplasia Within Sessile Serrated Polyps Using Endoscopic Imaging; a Prospective Observational Study
DOC.detailed_description: Observational study Structured endoscopic imaging protocol devised Applied prospectively to sequential SSP >= 8mm detected in a tertiary endoscopic resection cohort Review of specimens by blinded specialist pathologists Review of incongruent cases by endoscopists and pathologists
DOC.criteria: Patients referred to a tertiary endoscopic resection practice with any sessile serrated polyp (SSP) >= 8mm Patients referred to a tertiary endoscopic resection practice without sessile serrated polyps (SSP)
